title: The Black Chair: A Treatise on Exile and the Caledonian Cringe
tagline: A satirist exiled by his own culture embarks on a heretical quest to rewrite Scotland's foundational myth from a Prague pub.
themes: Satire as an Act of Treason
Diaspora as a State of Intellectual Freedom

story: Write a scene where Alistair receives a fan letter from another 'Black Chair' exile in a surprising location.
